title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Salty 747 - version 0.5.0
description:
In this addon spotlight we will have a look at the latest version of the Salty 747 Mod: version 0.5.0. It was already a while ago since the mod received an update but believe me this update is massive.

In addition to the changes of the mod the installer has also changed. The Salty 747 mod can now be installed via the FlyByWire installed (known from the A32NX). The installer allows you both the install the developer and stable release via a simply click.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:

Salty 747 cockpit
https://github.com/saltysimulations/salty-747

or you can download the FlyByWire Installer here and install it via that way:
https://flybywiresim.com/
